Feature.Description: This Feature provides access control for the implementing server. Therefore it specifies the SiLA Client Meta Data for the access token, that has been provided by the AuthenticationService. In order to use the servers functionlity, that access token has to be sent with every call to server.

StandardExecutionError.Description: The sent access token is not valid (lifetime might have exceeded)
The sent access token does not authorize to access the required SiLA Server functionality

Metadata.Description: Token to be sent with every call in order to get access to the SiLA Server functionality
